arm_group.arm_group_label: autologous bone marrow mesenchymal stem cells transplantation
arm_group.description: Every patient is given 1x106 MSCs per kg infused via liver artery
autologous bone marrow mesenchymal stem cells transplantation
autologous bone marrow mesenchymal stem cells transplantation

brief_summary.textblock:
Liver cirrhosis (LC) is the final destiny in chronic liver disease.The quality of life in
      liver cirrhosis patients with refractory ascites are very wretched. The objective of this
      study is to evaluate the therapeutic efficacy of autologous bone marrow mesenchymal stem
      cells (BMSCs) transplantation via liver artery in Child-Pugh B and C stage of liver
      cirrhosis patients with refractory ascites. The immunomodulatory impact of MSCs in fibrosis
      was confirmed, and several clinical studies have applied MSCs to eliminate the progression
      of fibrosis. In this research the investigators will study the affect and influence of MSCs
      in the patients,include assay of liver function,variation of ascites,Child-Pugh score etc.

clinical_study.brief_title: Autologous Mesenchymal Stem Cell Transplantation in Cirrhosis Patients With Refractory Ascites

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:Inclusion Criteria:

        Aged 18~65 years. Ultrasonographic evidences of cirrhosis. hepatic cirrhosis patients with
        refractory ascite.

        Exclusion Criteria:

        history of moderate to severe hepatic encephalopathy or variceal bleeding during the last
        two months before enrolment.

        Prothrombin time is less than 30s. Severe problems in other vital organs(e.g.the
        heart,renal or lungs). Liver tumor on ultrasonography, CT or MRI examination. Pregnant or
        lactating women. Imaging evidences of vascular thromboses.

        -

        Exclusion Criteria:

        -

arm_group_label: autologous bone marrow mesenchymal stem cells transplantation
intervention.description: Autologous MSCs were infused to patients using interventional method via hepatic artery . The catheter was inserted to proper hepatic artery. After the catheter placed at proper hepatic artery was confirmed by angiography, autologous bone marrow MSCs were infused slowly for 20-30 minutes.
intervention.intervention_name: autologous bone marrow mesenchymal stem cells transplantation

clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy of Autologous Mesenchymal Stem Cell Transplantation Via Liver Artery in Liver Cirrhosis Patients With Refractory Ascites

authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration
China: Ministry of Science and Technology

primary_outcome.measure: change in immune function,liver function in blood
primary_outcome.time_frame: before and one to 12 weeks after therapy

reference.citation: Kharaziha P, Hellström PM, Noorinayer B, Farzaneh F, Aghajani K, Jafari F, Telkabadi M, Atashi A, Honardoost M, Zali MR, Soleimani M. Improvement of liver function in liver cirrhosis patients after autologous mesenchymal stem cell injection: a phase I-II clinical trial. Eur J Gastroenterol Hepatol. 2009 Oct;21(10):1199-205.
